body_html:
BTW, you can use supervisor loop construct to add a modified summary writer:

sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_op=None)
with sv.managed_session() as sess:
    sv.loop(60, lambda: sv.summary_computed(sess, sess.run(summary_op, feed_dict=...)))
    <your training loop>
body_text:
BTW, you can use supervisor loop construct to add a modified summary writer:
sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_op=None)
with sv.managed_session() as sess:
    sv.loop(60, lambda: sv.summary_computed(sess, sess.run(summary_op, feed_dict=...)))
    <your training loop>
body:
BTW, you can use supervisor `loop` construct to add a modified summary writer:

```
sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_op=None)
with sv.managed_session() as sess:
    sv.loop(60, lambda: sv.summary_computed(sess, sess.run(summary_op, feed_dict=...)))
    <your training loop>
```
